channel.title: Dragon Website Template Release
channel.description:
I threw this together in about an hour. Hope you like it.
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg853/scaled.php?server=853&filename=previewmj.jpg&res=landing[/img]
[url=http://rspsdesigns.com/downloads/Source/downloads.php?download=14]Download...[/url]

item.title: Dragon Website Template Release
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

This topic is fine, it’s a website template and web designs have been allowed here so far, as we don’t have a RSPS web development board or anything similar.

EDIT - Just deleted a few more posts about whether this topic is allowed. I just said it was, so cut the argument or the next one to post about it gets infracted.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Website Template Release
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

[quote=“Kr3m1in, post:18, topic:448693”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=551578.msg4042090#msg4042090 date=1341730476]
It doesn’t say that anywhere, but it does say:

and have an appropriate connection to RS2 private servers.

[/quote]

Exactly my point. This website template has no connection RS2 private servers. It’s just general dlc - and spam.[/quote]
Just shut up.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Website Template Release
item.dc:creator: @Kr3m1in Kr3m1in
item.description:
@Kr3m1in wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:14, topic:448693”][quote author=Kr3m1in link=topic=551578.msg4042039#msg4042039 date=1341723641]

no no im pretty sure this is right section you dont need to put your useless comments out there davidi allowed black birds to release his templates they have not been removed

Maybe you should check out rule 4 before posting stupid posts like that.

4) NEW RULE: NON-SERVER & NON-CLIENT DOWNLOADS ARE ALLOWED

lolwut

The tool posted must follow all rules and have an appropriate connection to RS2 private servers.

Dumbass. Read the rules in their entirety - not just their titles. Christ.
[/quote]

This has a connection to RS2 Servers.

Where would this go then, smart ass?[/quote]

DOES IT SAY “RSPS WEBSITE TEMPLATE”, DUMBASS?!?!?!?!

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Website Template Release
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“Kr3m1in, post:13, topic:448693”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=551578.msg4042035#msg4042035 date=1341723166]

no no im pretty sure this is right section you dont need to put your useless comments out there davidi allowed black birds to release his templates they have not been removed

Maybe you should check out rule 4 before posting stupid posts like that.

4) NEW RULE: NON-SERVER & NON-CLIENT DOWNLOADS ARE ALLOWED

lolwut
[/quote]

The tool posted must follow all rules and have an appropriate connection to RS2 private servers.

Dumbass. Read the rules in their entirety - not just their titles. Christ.[/quote]
The website template was designed for RS2 private servers, was it not? It’s the same reason website templates have been getting posted for a while. How about before joining a community and calling everyone dumb-asses just because you read the rules, you at least look though a few pages of the section that you’re posting in, hmm?

item.title: Dragon Website Template Release
item.dc:creator: @Kr3m1in Kr3m1in
item.description:
@Kr3m1in wrote:

[quote=“i am infamy, post:7, topic:448693”][quote author=…::Coded::… link=topic=551578.msg4041760#msg4041760 date=1341705896]

Please people… if your going to design a website, put some effort into it… this would take me 4 mins to make (if i had the images already)
3 Mins the CSS and 1 min for the index page

(*dont mean to flame *)

Then make your own, he was just trying to do a nice thing, never discourage good intentions
[/quote]

Well said, im tired of all these coward’s give the guy a break he tried thats all that matters.[/quote]

What makes people voicing valid criticism ‘cowards’?

Btw, OP: This is the wrong section for a website template

Read full topic
